Class King

All Implemented Interfaces:
IntBishop, IntFigure
public class King extends Queen
Represents a king figure in the chess game.

      public King(String name, String color, char LocationX, int LocationY, IntChessBoard chessboard)
      Constructs a king figure with the specified name, color, position, and chessboard.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the king figure
      color - the color of the king figure
      LocationX - the horizontal position of the king figure
      LocationY - the vertical position of the king figure
      chessboard - the chessboard on which the king figure is placed

      Specified by:

      Overrides:

      Parameters:
